history.text: So what movie we got here?
Looks like Real Steel
What is Real Steel about?
It's based on a short story, and it is about fighting robots
It's described as Rocky with robots
Based on a short story? that sounds interesting like it would be a quick ride
Yeah, it stars Hugh Jackman, who I always enjoy and Evangeline Lilly
I love Rocky,  and Wolverine haha. Sounds like a winner
I assume its like 100 years in the future type thing?
I am not entirely sure, but I would assume so! It was already adapted into a Twilight Zone episode back in 1963, so I don't know how that all fits in!
Looking further, looks like its set in 2020
So it's a remake of a Twilight zone episode done into a full movie. Thats crazy
How do they control the robots? like get inside them or remote?
Some Voltron type stuff or power rangers haha
Sounds similar, yes! It sounds like they control them from the outside, remotely
The main character is Jackman's character, and he runs out on a debt to a carnival owner
Just generally sounds like a lot of crazy sci-fi stuff, but it sounds kinda fun!
OH so he has to win to pay it off isee one of those type of movies
Yes wondering what it's reated pg pg13 or R i hope R
I know, R-rated action movies are definitely better.
I am not sure exactly what this one is rated
But with the concept of fighting robots, I would think it might be violent
YEah i would imagine you could get all kinds of brutal in it and get a PG rating becaus they are just robots
True! Not a lot of blood there
It's like a movie loop hole for ratings
Apparently the robots are vocal controlled, but when the vocal controller is damaged Jackman has to "shadow box" for his robot
It sounds pretty cool
It only has a 59% on rotten tomatoes, but that's probably just because the critics hate action movies
Oh so he has to control it manually when the tech breaks down that sounds very Rockyish
Yes, definitely!
I think Rocky was a big inspiration for this, just if it were set in the future
yeah i don't listen to critics they are idiots in ivory towers
Haha very true!
If anything that low score makes me want to watch it more
Yes, I feel the same way! Nothing like a good underdog story
how long is it time wise?
I don't have that information in front of me, but I'd assume 2 hours ish? That seems pretty standard for these kinds of movies
Well im sold on this movie and lower than 2 hours is perfect
Yeah, definitely google to be sure on the time, but I think it sounds good too!

IS there no AI controlled
 robots?
or are they all 'dumb' so to speak
Not in this movie! Just remotely controlled ones, so more Battle Bots than anything else, I guess
I assume there is Romance in it kinda like Rocky.
Maybe as a background plot? The main plot definitely revolves around Jackman and his robots
Right so its just Jackman Alone no friend or mentor/student type thing?
Jackman has a son, so I think father/son is the main relationship here
So its a father son bonding movie about battle bots sounds great i think were done here.
I think so!
Have a great day!
Take care same to you

uid1response.feedback: Everything went well, and my partner was engaging. I had a hard time working everything into the conversation because I was busy responding to the other user's questions, but I tried as much as I could.

uid2response.feedback: Never heard of this movie before but as a rocky fan and this movie being inspired by rocky i want to watch it even more. It sounds great who doesn't want to see giant robots fight each other with hugh jackmen as the main hero.
